create-request.error-no-writes: You only have read rights for shipping orders in this organization, and therefore cannot create new orders.
create-request.create-not-allowed-text: You only have read rights for dispatch orders in the selected organization and therefore cannot change the sender.

dbp-create-request.error-no-read: You are currently not assigned to an organization in which you have read or write permissions for dispatch requests.
dbp-create-request.error-no-writes: You have read-only rights for shipping orders in this organization, and therefore cannot edit, submit, or delete dispatch requests.

dbp-show-requests.error-no-read: You are currently not assigned to an organization in which you have read or write permissions for dispatch requests.
dbp-show-requests.error-no-writes: You have read-only rights for shipping orders in this organization, and therefore cannot edit, submit, or delete dispatch requests.
